net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.rule.stat
Interface StatisticalRule

All Superinterfaces:
PropertySource, Rule
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractNcssCountRule, AbstractNcssCountRule, AbstractStatisticalJavaRule, AbstractStatisticalPLSQLRule, AbstractStatisticalVmRule, ExcessiveClassLengthRule, ExcessiveImportsRule, ExcessiveLengthRule, ExcessiveLengthRule, ExcessiveMethodLengthRule, ExcessiveMethodLengthRule, ExcessiveNodeCountRule, ExcessiveNodeCountRule, ExcessiveObjectLengthRule, ExcessivePackageBodyLengthRule, ExcessivePackageSpecificationLengthRule, ExcessiveParameterListRule, ExcessiveParameterListRule, ExcessivePublicCountRule, ExcessiveTemplateLengthRule, ExcessiveTypeLengthRule, NcssConstructorCountRule, NcssMethodCountRule, NcssMethodCountRule, NcssObjectCountRule, NcssTypeCountRule, NPathComplexityRule, NPathComplexityRule, SwitchDensityRule
public interface StatisticalRule
extends Rule

This interface tags a Rule as being a Statistical rule, producing various metrics from data points.

See Also:
DataPoint, Metric, StatisticalRuleHelper
